resources.string: Make sure you eat a balanced and nutritious diet. Consider speaking to a health professional for guidance on how to gain weight in a healthy way.
Congratulations on maintaining a healthy weight. Continue with healthy eating and exercise habits. Maintain an active lifestyle and continue eating a balanced diet.
Consider adjusting your diet to include more nutritious foods and reduce empty calories. Increase your physical activity to burn more calories and improve your cardiovascular health.

Consult a doctor or dietitian to develop a safe and effective weight loss plan. Make changes to your lifestyle, such as increasing physical activity and reducing your consumption of high-calorie, high-fat foods.
Seek professional support to address obesity and reduce the risk of health complications. Consider joining a support group or weight loss program supervised by health professionals.
